mapper.insert: insert into CLASS (class_name, class_category, class_type, class_minStudentNum, class_maxStudentNum, class_currentStudentNum, class_coverImagePath, class_tutorIntroduce, class_classIntroduce, class_target, class_pricePerHour, class_timePerDay, class_dayPerMonth, class_price, class_placeComment, class_notice, class_status, class_score, TUTOR_tutor_id, TUTOR_USER_user_id) values (#{class_name}, #{class_category}, #{class_type}, #{class_minStudentNum}, #{class_maxStudentNum}, #{class_currentStudentNum}, #{class_coverImagePath}, #{class_tutorIntroduce}, #{class_classIntroduce}, #{class_target}, #{class_pricePerHour}, #{class_timePerDay}, #{class_dayPerMonth}, #{class_price}, #{class_placeComment}, #{class_notice}, #{class_status}, 5.0, #{TUTOR_tutor_id}, #{TUTOR_USER_user_id})
mapper.select: select class_id, class_name, class_regdate, class_category, class_type, class_minStudentNum, class_maxStudentNum, class_currentStudentNum, class_coverImagePath, class_tutorIntroduce, class_classIntroduce, class_target, class_pricePerHour, class_timePerDay, class_dayPerMonth, class_price, class_placeComment, class_notice, class_status, class_score, TUTOR_tutor_id from CLASS where class_id = #{class_id}
mapper.update: update CLASS set class_id =#{class_id}, class_name =#{class_name}, class_regdate =#{class_regdate}, class_category =#{class_category}, class_type =#{class_type}, class_minStudentNum =#{class_minStudentNum}, class_maxStudentNum =#{class_maxStudentNum}, class_coverImagePath =#{class_coverImagePath}, class_tutorIntroduce =#{class_tutorIntroduce}, class_classIntroduce =#{class_classIntroduce}, class_target =#{class_target}, class_pricePerHour =#{class_pricePerHour}, class_timePerDay =#{class_timePerDay}, class_dayPerMonth =#{class_dayPerMonth}, class_price =#{class_price}, class_placeComment =#{class_placeComment}, class_notice =#{class_notice}, class_status =#{class_status} where class_id = #{class_id}
mapper.select: select c.class_id, t.tutor_name, u.user_profileImagePath, c.class_regdate, c.class_coverImagePath, c.class_name, c.class_pricePerHour, c.class_type, c.class_score from CLASS c left outer join TUTOR t on c.TUTOR_tutor_id = t.tutor_id left outer join USER u on t.USER_user_id = u.user_id;

select c.class_id, t.tutor_name, u.user_profileImagePath, c.class_regdate, c.class_coverImagePath, c.class_name, c.class_pricePerHour, c.class_type, c.class_score from CLASS c left outer join TUTOR t on c.TUTOR_tutor_id = t.tutor_id left outer join USER u on t.USER_user_id = u.user_id; where c.class_id > 0 order by c.class_id desc, c.class_regdate desc limit #{page}, 10

select class_id, class_regdate, class_coverImagePath, class_name, class_pricePerHour, class_type, class_score from CLASS where class_id > 0 order by class_id desc, class_regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(class_id) from CLASS where class_id > 0

select * from CLASS where class_id > 0
order by class_id desc
